apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the pregnant person emoji with a medium-dark skin tone shows a gentle silhouette, conveying a profound sense of anticipation and new beginnings. Apple's design language imbues this emoji with soft, rounded forms and realistic lighting that highlight the subtle curve of the belly, symbolizing fertility, growth, and the journey of parenthood. Itâ€™s a respectful and tender representation used to share news of pregnancy or express support for expectant individuals.
